pinyin: fó shì jīn zhuāng, rén shì yī zhuāng
description: Similar to 「Fo kao jin zhuang, ren kao yi zhuang」. Literally means 「Buddha relies on gold leaf, people rely on clothes」, implying that external appearance is often valued more than internal qualities.

examples.chinese: 佛是金装,人是衣装,世人眼孔浅的多,只看皮相,不看骨相
examples.translation: Clothes make the man; people in this world are often shallow and only look at appearance, not essence.

examples.chinese: 人靠衣装,佛靠金装,真的服装穿着很重要
examples.translation: Clothes make the man; dressing well is really important.

examples.chinese: 佛靠金装,人靠衣装：三分长相,七分打扮
examples.translation: Clothes make the man; 30% is looks, 70% is dressing up.
